Title: Don't Bury This Case
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Craig Gore, Tim Walsh
Actors: Jason Beghe, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer, Patrick John Flueger
Plot: Kelly Severide of Firehouse 51 is brought to the District for questioning when his car is found to have caused a deadly crash, so the team tracks down a group of carjackers that may prove Severide's innocence.
